short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supports product sourcing from multiple platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The collection plugin supports the collection of product information from multiple e-commerce platforms, interfaces with multiple cross-border e-commerce platforms, and comprehensively solves the management issues of cross-border e-commerce. In response to the personalized management needs of e-commerce, the platform can provide fast customized services to help enterprises take off.
